amendment.description: Amendment places limits on USDA acquisition of new information technology systems or significant upgrades.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the bill prohibiting the use of funds from being available to acquire new information technology systems or significant upgrades, as determined by the Office of Chief Information Officer, without the approval of the Chief Information Officer and the concurrence of the Executive Information Technology Investment Review Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
